name: Topic
schema:
scalar JSON
scalar DateTime

type Query {
  metrics(
    topic: String, 
    datatype: String,
    start: DateTime!,
    end: DateTime!
    max: Int)
    : [Metric]
}

type Mutation {
  addMetric(
    topic: String!, 
    data: JSON!, 
    recursive: Boolean)
    : Metric
}

type Metric {
  timestamp: DateTime
  datatype: String
  topic: String
  data: JSON
}

name: Payload Recursion
Bad Topic Type
Bad Topic Type
Cleanse
Null Payload
Valid Topic and Payload
Build Parameters
Log all new data to the Historian
Log Data
query:
INSERT INTO metrics (server_timestamp, datatype, topic, data)
VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4);

name: Build Payload
Publish a payload to a topic
Get By Topic
query:
SELECT 
    server_timestamp AS timestamp,
    datatype,
    topic,
    data
FROM 
    metrics 
WHERE 
    topic LIKE $1 AND 
    datatype LIKE $2 AND 
    server_timestamp BETWEEN $3 AND $4
ORDER BY 
    server_timestamp DESC
LIMIT $5;

name: Get Parameters
Get Parameters
Retreive Data
query:
SELECT
    server_timestamp AS timestamp,
    datatype,
    topic,
    data
FROM 
    metrics 
WHERE 
    topic LIKE $1 AND 
    datatype LIKE $2 AND 
    server_timestamp BETWEEN $3 AND $4
ORDER BY 
    server_timestamp DESC
LIMIT $5;

name: Build Payload
Build Object
Build Object

query:
SELECT 
    COUNT(*) AS count,
    AVG(time_difference) AS avg,
    MIN(time_difference) AS min,
    MAX(time_difference) AS max
FROM (
    SELECT *, AGE(database_timestamp, server_timestamp) AS time_difference
    FROM public.metrics
    WHERE database_timestamp > NOW() - INTERVAL '1 minute'
) AS last_minute;

name: Clean Results
Schedule Regular Queries to Monitor Health

query:
SELECT
  pg_database_size(current_database()) AS db_size,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pg_stat_activity) AS total_connections,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pg_stat_activity WHERE state = 'active') AS active_connections,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pg_stat_activity WHERE state = 'idle') AS idle_connections
FROM
  pg_database
WHERE
  datname = current_database();

name: Clean Results

query:
SELECT 
  round(sum(blks_hit)::numeric / nullif(sum(blks_hit) + sum(blks_read), 0) * 100, 2) AS cache_hit_rate,
  sum(xact_commit) AS total_commits,
  sum(xact_rollback) AS total_rollbacks,
  sum(blks_read) AS blocks_read,
  sum(blks_hit) AS blocks_hit
FROM 
  pg_stat_database;

name: Clean Results

query:
SELECT 
    COUNT(*) AS count,
    AVG(time_difference) AS avg,
    MIN(time_difference) AS min,
    MAX(time_difference) AS max
FROM (
    SELECT *, AGE(database_timestamp, server_timestamp) AS time_difference
    FROM public.metrics
    WHERE database_timestamp > NOW() - INTERVAL '1 hour'
) AS last_minute;
